title: Lost lp even because i disconnected?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Was playing a ranked game with a friend and my internet died for about 5-7 mins. I was playing fine and we were beating them hard in bot and their jungle. Even though I disconnected they still surrendered and it says I won the game. Still lost 18 lp though. I really don't get what happened, if I disconnected even though we wouldve won why do I have to lose lp. It wasn't my fault my internet crashed.

replies.body: You ended up losing LP for that match because dodges or leaves count as a loss for you even if your team wins the ranked match without you. Our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q3) goes over how afk's or disconnects are handled in ranked games.
I'm with @Like The Draven if it is an internet caused disconnect I think it should not be punished
Even if it was unintentional and out of my control?
